SRST2
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which SRST2 installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using SRST2, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load SRST2/0.2.0-20210620-foss-2020b-Python-2.7.18
```
